Uses of Class
java.io.BufferedReader

  • Packages that use BufferedReader 
    Package Description
    java.io
    Provides for system input and output through data streams, serialization and the file system.
    java.nio.file
    Defines interfaces and classes for the Java virtual machine to access files, file attributes, and file systems.

    • Uses of BufferedReader in java.io

      Subclasses of BufferedReader in java.io 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LineNumberReader
      A buffered character-input stream that keeps track of line numbers.

    • Uses of BufferedReader in java.nio.file

      Methods in java.nio.file that return BufferedReader 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BufferedReader Files.newBufferedReader(Path path)
      Opens a file for reading, returning a BufferedReader to read text from the file in an efficient manner.
      static BufferedReader Files.newBufferedReader(Path path, Charset cs)
      Opens a file for reading, returning a BufferedReader that may be used to read text from the file in an efficient manner.
